sentences.sentence: I was sorely tempted to retaliate.
If you don't come to the reunion you'll be sorely missed.
sentences.translation: 你要是不来参加团聚，大家会非常想念你的。

sentences.sentence: Twill wake him to take him up and put him within the bed, and he sorely needeth sleep.
sentences.translation: 要叫醒他，把他抱起来放在床上，他非常需要睡眠。
